formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Ideal speed ratio (ignoring slip): r = N_1 / N_2 = D_2 / D_1 Driven RPM with slip s (fraction): N_2 = N_1 \cdot \dfrac{D_1}{D_2} \cdot (1 - s) Belt linear speed (using driver): v = \dfrac{\pi\, D_1\, N_1}{60} Required driven diameter for target N_{2,t}: D_{2,\mathrm{req}} = \dfrac{D_1\, N_1\, (1 - s)}{N_{2,t}}
